name: NuRoam
overview:
NuRoam provides a (patent pending) Hardware/Software solution that provides a Personal (P2P) Mobile Roaming at a fraction of the price of the Carrier provided mobile roaming.

In this era where smartphones are creating a ‘social’ revolution, Its a shame that International Mobile roaming (Voice/SMS/Internet) is so expensive.

On an average, Mobile Roaming costs $3/min voice, 25 cents per SMS and $20 / MB of mobile internet.

While the die-hards have figured out ways and means to get mobile services and avoid roaming fees and enjoy Mobile Voice/SMS/Internet when traveling, it still does not mimic the ‘true’ seamless roaming experience offered by Carriers.

NuRoam replicates the ‘real’ mobile roaming at a fraction of the cost of Carrier provided roaming.

NuRoam is currently conduction beta trials with controlled users.
